titleStmt.title: Wallography, or, The Britton describ'd being a pleasant relation of a journey into Wales ... : and also many choice observables ... of that countrey and people / by W.R., a mighty lover of Welch travels.
Wallography
titleStmt.author: W. R. (William Richards), 1643-1705.

titleStmt.title: Wallography, or, The Britton describ'd being a pleasant relation of a journey into Wales ... : and also many choice observables ... of that countrey and people / by W.R., a mighty lover of Welch travels.
Wallography
titleStmt.author: W. R. (William Richards), 1643-1705.

notesStmt.note: Epistle dedicatory "To Sir Richard Wenman of Casswell" signed: W. R. [i.e. William Richards] Cf. BM.
Also published as: The Britons described, or, A journey through Wales, and as: Dean Swift's ghost.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
